name: 🦄 unipug 🐶
description:
🦄 you're a unipug... part unicorn, part pug! 🐶

⬆️ ⬇️ use WASD / arrow keys to move around. ➡️ ⬅️

👋 collect all the pug beans and avoid the bad bun! 🐰

👀 find the pot of gold 💰

*************

📚 this goofy game was made for a workshop on 12/2/16 @ the stephen gaynor school

🖍 the entire class helped design the character and background

🔨 code, art, music by jenny jiao hsia (@q_dork)

💢 sfx by pauline ceraulo + freesounds.org
